name: Am I Unique
description: Website where you can test your device fingerprint and see how unique you are compared to others. It gives valuable insights in the components used to create such a device fingerprint

name: BrowserLeaks
description: Privacy evaluation suite that offers various tools to test the security and privacy of your web browser.

name: Cover Your Tracks
description: Test to see how well your browser is protected against device fingerprinting. Here you can get an overview of how identifying each fingerprinting characteristic is.
